result.markdown: --- title: "R packages for building robust, production grade `{shiny}` apps." about: id: hero-heading template: broadside image: img/profile.png listing: - contents: news type: default id: blog-listings max-items: 5 sort: "date desc" feed: true --- :::{#hero-heading} The golemverse is a collection of R packages for building `{shiny}` apps that need to be safely shipped to production. ### Packages from the golemverse - `{bank}`, Extra Cache - `{brochure}`, Multipage 'Shiny' Apps - `{dockerfiler}`, Easy Dockerfile Creation from R - `{elvis}`, 'Shiny' renderers and observers made safer - `{fakir}`, Create Fake Data in R for tutorials - `{gargoyle}`, An Event-Based Mechanism for 'Shiny' - `{gemstones}`, Make Your 'golem' App Shine - `{golem}`, Make Your 'golem' App Shine - `{ghooks}`, 'Golem' Hooks for Standard 'Shiny' Apps - `{shinipsum}`, Lorem-Ipsum Helper Function for 'shiny' Prototyping - `{w3css}`, W3CSS for 'shiny' ::: ## Read the book üìö ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-6} Learn more about building `{shiny}` apps for production with the _Engineering Production-Grade Shiny Apps_.
